<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from display_value="Run Server Side Script">7f403e8a1b5050d0a89720a8ec4bcbdb</copied_from><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes>Verify that the users A1 and A2 und silos have been set up properly</notes><order>24</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-23 13:12:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>b3d210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbe5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilos" source="x_snc_datasilos">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilos">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_b3d210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbe5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-15 12:51:58</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="DataSilos - Incident - Cross-silo">0fd21ca61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbbe</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=b3d210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbe5"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>b3d210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbe5</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-23 13:12:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>33d210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbe6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-23 13:25:42</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {

function GetGroupsFromUser(strUserSysId)
{
	strUserSysId = ''+strUserSysId;
	var aGroups = [];
	var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	if (grUser.get(strUserSysId) == null)
	{
		return aGroups;
	}
	var grUserGroups = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	grUserGroups.addQuery('user','=',strUserSysId);
	grUserGroups.query();
	while(grUserGroups.next())
	{
		aGroups.push(grUserGroups.getValue('group'));
	}
	return aGroups;
}
	
	
/*
function RenderValue(vValue, nLevel)
{
	nLevel = parseInt(nLevel);
	var strLevel = '___';
	strLevel = strLevel.repeat(nLevel);
	
	var bIsObject = vValue instanceof Object;
	var strTypeOf = typeof vValue;

	if (vValue === undefined)
	{
		return 'undefined';
	}
	if (vValue === null)
	{
		return 'null';
	}

	var strOutput = '';
	
	if (Array.isArray(vValue))
	{
		if (vValue.length == 0)
		{
			strOutput += strLevel+'[]';
		}
		else
		{
			vValue.forEach( function(vElement,nKey)
			{
				strOutput += '\n'+strLevel+'['+nKey+']: '+RenderValue(vElement,nLevel+1);
			});
		}
	}
	else if (bIsObject || (strTypeOf == 'object'))
	{
		if (vValue.getValue == undefined)
		{
			Object.keys(vValue).forEach( function(strKey)
			{
				strOutput += '\n'+strLevel+'["'+strKey+'"]: '+RenderValue(''+vValue[strKey],nLevel+1);
			});
		}
		else
		{
			Object.keys(vValue).forEach( function(strKey)
			{
				strOutput += '\n'+strLevel+'["'+strKey+'"]: '+RenderValue(vValue.getValue(strKey),nLevel+1);
			});
		}
	}
	else
	{
		strOutput += ''+vValue;
	}
	return strOutput;
}
*/
	/*
	function RenderValue(vValue)
	{
		return ''+vValue;
	}
	*/
	
	/*
	var RenderValue = x_snc_devtools.RenderValue;
	var Debug = x_snc_devtools.Debug;
	Debug('Verify the creation of users during the InitializeRecords test');
	
	stepUserA1 = steps('abd210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbb6');
	//Debug(RenderValue(stepUserA1));
	stepUserA2 = steps('ebd210e61b9490d0a89720a8ec4bcbd4');
	//Debug(RenderValue(stepUserA2));
	
	var strUserA1 = stepUserA1.user.toString();
	var strUserA2 = stepUserA2.user.toString();

	
	Debug('User A1: '+strUserA1);
	Debug('User A2: '+strUserA2);
	
	//var GetGroupsFromUser = x_snc_devtools.GetGroupsFromUser;
	
	var aUserA1Groups = GetGroupsFromUser(strUserA1);
	var aUserA2Groups = GetGroupsFromUser(strUserA2);

	Debug('Groups A1: '+RenderValue(aUserA1Groups));
	Debug('Groups A2: '+RenderValue(aUserA2Groups));
	
	if (aUserA1Groups.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: A1 has no groups!');
		return false;
	}
	if (aUserA2Groups.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: A2 has no groups!');

		return false;
	}
	
	var aUserA1Silos = GetSilosFromUser(strUserA1);
	var aUserA2Silos = GetSilosFromUser(strUserA2);

	Debug('Silos A1: '+RenderValue(aUserA1Silos));
	Debug('Silos A2: '+RenderValue(aUserA2Silos));
	
	if (aUserA1Silos.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: User A1 has no silos!');
		return false;
	}
	if (aUserA2Silos.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: User A2 has no silos!');
		return false;
	}
	*/
	
	return true;

	
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
